summary.para: Gets the content description that was used to create the video processor.

param.name: pDesc
param.para: A pointer to a structure that receives the content description.

summary.para: Gets the rate conversion capabilities of the video processor.

param.name: pCaps
param.para: A pointer to a structure that receives the rate conversion capabilities.

summary.para: Represents a video processor for Microsoft Direct3D 11.

remarks.para: To get a pointer to this interface, call .
